name: Dream Maker
passive: Renew: Healing or shielding an ally grants them 8% Movement Speed for 2 seconds and marks them. Your next ability against an enemy will consume the mark to deal bonus magic damage.
active:
heals or shields blows both Dream Bubbles to them, empowering hem for 3 seconds.The two bubbles grant their nest hit 15-90 bonus outgoing magic damage () and a 15-30% Movement Speed bonus for 3 seconds. 500


Dream Maker TIPS: This boot enchant generates two “dream bubbles” at regular intervals. When you heal or shield an ally, both bubbles burst on them, empowering their next hit with bonus magic damage and granting a temporary movement speed boost.  — Perfect for enchanter supports who want to both protect their team and empower their carries with extra damage and mobility at critical moments.
